mapper.insert: insert into club_auth (club_no, mem_grade, auth_write, auth_mod, auth_cash, auth_access, auth_info, auth_member, auth_club) values (#{club_no}, #{mem_grade}, #{auth_write}, #{auth_mod}, #{auth_cash}, #{auth_access}, #{auth_info}, #{auth_member}, #{auth_club})
mapper.update: update club_auth set auth_write = #{auth_write}, auth_mod = #{auth_mod}, auth_cash = #{auth_cash}, auth_access = #{auth_access}, auth_info = #{auth_info}, auth_member = #{auth_member}, auth_club = #{auth_club} where club_no=#{club_no} and mem_grade=#{mem_grade}
mapper.delete: delete from club_auth where club_no=#{club_no} and mem_grade=#{mem_grade}
mapper.select: select * from club_auth where club_no=#{club_no} and mem_grade=1
